definition: Brown (name)/Gordon Brown (1951-), UK politician, prime minister 2007-2010
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
Blang people, one of the 56 ethnic groups officially recognized by the PRC
The Bronx, borough of New York City/Bronx County (coextensive with The Bronx)/also written 布朗士

definition: The Bronx, borough of New York City/Bronx County (coextensive with The Bronx)/also written 布朗克斯
The Bronx, borough of New York City

sentences.english: The Browns are all college graduates.
sentences.chinese: 布朗一家人都是大學畢業生。

sentences.english: Some years ago, a good family moved into the third floor apartment of the tenement where we lived in the Bronx.
sentences.chinese: 多年前，我們住在布朗克斯時，三樓搬來一家新租戶。

sentences.english: Mr. Brown owns the amber anhydrates in the city belfry.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生領有鬧市區塔裏的棕色毛巾。
“莫里森是個很棒的球員，”布朗說。

sentences.english: Brown is right on with his handicapping of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 布朗的理解也並非不正確。

sentences.english: Mr Brown boarded his son with that family.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生讓兒子食宿都在那戶人家。

sentences.english: LeBron will catch him, but today it's still Bird.
sentences.chinese: 勒布朗會追上他的，但現在還是拉里伯德。

sentences.english: It is called Bronner's CHRISTmas Wonderland in Frankenmuth, Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 它就是密歇根州法蘭克幕斯城的布朗納聖誕樂園。

sentences.english: Shea filled in for Brown at right-back.
sentences.chinese: 奧謝則填補了布朗右邊的空缺。

sentences.english: He said he hoped rumours that Brown would quit would come true.
sentences.chinese: 他希望布朗因爲身體原因提前辭職的傳言成真。

sentences.english: Marshalled by Ferdinand and Wes Brown, however, United's defence rarely creaked under the Latics' pressure.
sentences.chinese: 由於有費迪南德和布朗坐鎮，曼聯的防線還算穩固。

sentences.english: Mr. Brown, Mr. Baker is defaulted , you will this walkover match.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生，由於貝克先生棄權了，你不戰而勝。

sentences.english: This is Mr. Tian speaking. Could you connect me with Mr. Brown?
sentences.chinese: 我是田先生，你能轉給布朗先生嗎？

sentences.english: The mean first-passage time of the Brownian bound oscillator is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 求出了布朗束縛振子的平均第一通過時間。
